channel.title: ! Bluescap3 Development ! Updated 25-8-09 NOW with live video updates!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=16pt]Bluescap3 Development[/size][/b][/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/bluescap3banner.jpg[/img][/center] [center][b][size=16pt]post if you like or not to keep topic alive!!![/size][/b][/center] [b]Development Info[/b] [ul][li]Website - .com, From Godaddy already bought[/li][/ul] [ul][li]Base - Delta, Delta Client for the client.[/li][/ul] [ul][li]Status - 0%, view the status section of the thread for more information.[/li][/ul] [b]Status and Updates[/b] [b]Updates[/b] Client - 5% Server - 1% [b]Credits[/b] Base -Delta Team. i dont know the exact people. Client -Delta Client Team. [b]Follow me on my live steam show i will be answering any questions you may have and also talking about Updates and Future updates 2 come[b] bye clicking - [url=http://www.ustream.tv/channel/bluescap3-live]LIVE VIDEO[/url] [center][b]ok now that we got that out of the way lets get started on the stats and Features of the server :)[/b][/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/Combatskillscross.png[/img][b][size=12pt]Combat Skills[/size][/b][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/Combatskillscross.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/attackcb.png[/img]Attack - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/strcb.png[/img]Strength - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/defcb.png[/img]Defence - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/rangecb.png[/img]Ranged - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/prayercb.png[/img]Prayer - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/magiccb.png[/img]Mage - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/hpcb.png[/img]HitPoints - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/skillschart.png[/img][b][size=12pt]Skills[/size][/b][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/skillschart.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/crafting.png[/img]Crafting - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/fletching-1.png[/img]Fletching - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/mining.png[/img]Mining - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/smithing.png[/img]Smithing - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/fishing.png[/img]Fishing - 10%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/cooking.png[/img]Cooking - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/firemaking.png[/img]Firemaking - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/woodcutting.png[/img]Woodcutting - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/runecrafting.png[/img]RuneCrafting - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/slayer.png[/img]Slayer - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/farming.png[/img]Farming -0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/agility.png[/img]Agility- 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/herblore.png[/img]Herblore- 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/thieving.png[/img]Thieving-0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/questsicon.png[/img][b][size=12pt]Quests[/size][/b][/center] [center]The Restless Ghost -0% Cook's Assistant - 0% Desert Treasure - 0% Vampire Slayer - 0% Monkey Madness - 0% Sheep Shearer - 0% Legends Quest - 0% Lunar Diplomacy - 0% Knight's Legend - 0% Lunar Spirit - 0% The Wolf's Cure - 0%[/center] [center][b]I will be uploading some videos & pictures as i go along[/b][/center]
[b]Client Side[/b] *Deleted Runescape Logo *Deleted Runescape Flames *cleaned Client.java *fixed Catche *deleted music tab *added a clean model system *[b]To do[/b] *add rs weapon interface *new models *new interfaces(made by me) [b]Server Side[/b] *Started Fishing *Right Fishing emote *Good XP Rate *ok fishing timer *You failed to fish & catch fish system.
[center][b]Update 8-8-09[/b][/center] [center]*Client update's the new features here[/center] [center]New back ground FOG! - Credits to Tonic[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/newbackgroundfog.jpg[/img][/center] [center]New Clicking Interface - Credits to Tonic[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/newclickinginterface.jpg[/img][/center] [center][b]Update 16-8-09[/b][/center] [center]*Client update's the new features here[/center] [center]New Godsword Stance - Credits to cocoa[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/newgsstance.jpg[/img][/center] [center][b]Update 17-8-09[/b][/center] [center]*Client update's the new features here[/center] [center]New Client Background - Credits to Me[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/rstitle.png[/img][/center] [center]=[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/rsbackground.jpg[/img][/center] [center][b]Update 18-8-09[/b][/center] [center]*Server update's the new features here[/center] [center]level 1 Fishing - Credits to Me[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/fishing-1.jpg[/img][/center] [center]If you support Bluescap3 please use the Bluescap3 forum sign/center] [center][IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/Bluescap3sign.png[/img][/center] [b]oh yes i was told to upload this to[/b] [img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/accept.jpg[/img]
